column4: Hi, a colleague's X setup got broken by an update today.  He's using nvidia.  Is anyone aware of this?
i have seen it, but i use driver 173, not 177
So switch to 173 will fix the issue?
177 wont run on my machine for one reason or another, but 173 is fine too, i think 173 is still in beta
most likely, i would use envyng
i installed 177 about 2 days ago, took a few hours to get my system graphical again
There is no 177 in hardy, right?
envyng will tell you, i dont see why a graphic driver version would be different
i use intrepid, so i really cant tell you
i would get envyng, uninstall the driver he has now, then run envyng again and install the driver is suggests to use. that did it for me at least
make sure he reboots after uninstalling the driver, and again after installing
bah, I want to figure out what broke it, not recommened a relatively-inexperienced user to go down an unsupported route.
do what suits you, happy hunting :D
